We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made.`` We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.'' on what bedbugs look like, and how to inspect and sanitize belongings. Many people just want to discard all luggage and clothing after discovering an infestation, but Kells and Jeff Hahn say this is unnecessary. The key is to contain all items suspected of carrying bed bugs in plastic bags until the items can be laundered, washed by hand, heated, or frozen, they advise. Announcing financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2010.
